Take the Charge with you anywhere due to its IP67 waterproof and dustproof rating

body.description: Take the party with you no matter what the weather. The JBL Charge 5 speaker delivers bold JBL Original Pro Sound, with its optimized long excursion driver, separate tweeter and dual pumping JBL bass radiators. Up to 20 hours of playtime and a handy powerbank to keep your devices charged to keep the party going all night. Rain? Spilled drinks? Beach sand? The IP67 waterproof and dustproof Charge 5 survives whatever comes its way. Thanks to PartyBoost, you can connect multiple JBL PartyBoost-enabled speakers for a sound big enough for any crowd. With all-new colors inspired by the latest street fashion trends, it looks as great as it sounds.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Play and Charge Endlessly JBL Charge 5 Take the party with you no matter what the weather. Up to 20 hours of playtime and a powerbank to keep your devices charged to keep the party going all night. With its IP67 waterproof and dustproof design, the Charge 5 will survive whatever comes its way.

JBL Charge 5 Bold JBL Original Pro Sound Take the amazing power of JBL pro sound with you. The JBL Charge 5 has an optimized long excursion driver, a separate tweeter, and dual JBL bass radiators, all delivering impressively rich and clear audio. Get that big room sound, even when outdoors.

JBL Charge 5 Wireless Bluetooth Streaming Thanks to PartyBoost, you can connect multiple JBL PartyBoost-enabled speakers for a sound big enough for any crowd. With all-new colors inspired by the latest street fashion trends, it looks as good as it sounds.
JBL Charge 5 IP67 Waterproof and Dustproof To the pool. To the park. JBL Charge 5 is IP67 waterproof and dustproof, so you can bring your speaker anywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Rock On with This Affordable, High-Performance Portable Bluetooth Speaker! 🎸🔊🤘
reviews.reviewText: TLDR: Affordable, powerful Bluetooth speaker with impressive bass, waterproof, long battery life. 🎵💦🔋In the realm of portable Bluetooth speakers, this one stands out as a powerhouse, especially considering its price point. It's like finding a diamond in the rough of audio gear.When you need your music loud and clear, this speaker delivers. It's like having a personal concert wherever you go. The bass packs a punch – it's deep, rich, and adds an extra layer of oomph to your tunes.The waterproof feature is a game-changer. Whether you're poolside, caught in a drizzle, or just want to jam out in the shower, this speaker has got you covered. It's like having a musical sidekick that's not afraid to take a plunge.Battery life is another area where this speaker shines. It holds up impressively, even with the volume cranked up and frequent use. It's like the Energizer Bunny of speakers – it keeps going and going.And for all the heavy metal fans out there, this speaker is a dream. It captures the essence of metal music beautifully, making it a perfect companion for headbanging sessions.Overall, it's a fantastic product that offers great value for money. If you're on the hunt for a portable Bluetooth speaker that's loud, proud, and resilient, this is the one to go for. Highly recommended for anyone who loves their music with a bit of edge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For so long, I convinced myself I didn’t need it, and yet when there was a discount on it, I concluded with one thing.I needed it.So of course I had to buy it and boy oh boy, is this such a great speaker. Speaking on size, this speaker was a lot bigger than I imagined. It’s a lot bigger than the Charge 3, which was pretty big in my eyes, but this feels a lot bigger. I wouldn’t say it’s the most portable speaker, unless you have a very large bag or are comfortable carrying it around. This thing will definitely be staying at home with me 80% of the time. As you can see, this thing is a lot bigger than the Flip 6 while being a lot smaller than the Xtreme 2. Speaking on the quality, this thing looks absolutely amazing. I simply love the aesthetic look and the green just looks amazing alongside the Flip 6. It feels incredibly sturdy to hold and it feels lightweight! And from my experience, the battery life is pretty fantastic, but I don’t believe it is the full 20 hours like advertised. And charging does take a bit, but the speaker being USB-C is a major convenience.Finally, let’s talk about the sound. When I compared it to the Flip 6, I was quite impressed.For the size difference, the Charge 5 comes across as much louder and retains much of its bass as you put the volume up, and against the Xtreme 2, I’m surprised at how well it held off on it’s own. I definitely prefer the Charge 5’s sound signature over the Xtreme’s. The Charge 5 is a bass monster and you can really feel it during a lot of songs. With the adjustable EQ within the JBL app, I was able to tune the speaker to how I’d like, which is always a helpful feature.Overall, the JBL Charge 5 is a loud, powerful, but also attractive and trendy looking speaker. In terms of whether you should buy this over the Flip 6, it’s really up to what you need. If you a small speaker you can easily carry around, get the Flip 6. If you want a souped up, larger, but also more powerful speaker that is a little more difficult to take on the go with you, but that’s not an issue with you. Get a Charge 5, but also wait for a discount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars JBL makes a GREAT Bluetooth speaker!
reviews.reviewText: For the price, it's a great portable Bluetooth speaker. Blasts loud music when you want it, and noticeable bass hits too. Water proof feature is great too, and charge holds for a long time, even with frequent use at higher volume. Great product, recommended for heavy metal music enthusiasts!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Booming sound, light weight, and great battery life!!!! I love this speaker. It has amazingly clear sound and strong bass for such a small size. Connection to my cellphone was quick and easy. I bought this speaker to have music at the beach and it didn’t disappoint. If you are considering a more expensive Bluetooth speaker, then give this one a try first. I was so happy with it I bought another one to give to a friend as a gift. I haven’t tried to link multiple Charge 5 speakers, but it is a nice feature that I hope to use soon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This thing is awesome
reviews.reviewText: Sound quality: For a speaker this size, I have never experienced better sound quality. No, it isn't really audiophile, but as a portable speaker it's great. It can fill up a room very well with little loss of clarity.Battery life: I feel like I've never charged this. I got it around three months ago, use it nearly daily, and have charged it just once or twice.Durability: I haven't played football with it or anything but it has traveled perfectly well.Connectivity: Works perfectly.Charge port: I've only used this once but it seems fully functional.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Everything except the battery life is great
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to replace my Charge 3 that I lost and highly recommend it. It uses a usb-c instead of a micro, which is nice because now everything I own uses the same charging cord. It has upper-middle sound quality, which is about the best you can get out of a portable Bluetooth speaker (it's just not possible to get really high-quality sound out of these types of speakers; this is as good as it gets). It is louder than anything this small has any right to be. There's nowhere in my 1600 sq ft house I can put this thing and not hear it everywhere else. It's great for backyard parties and setting it in a central location while you move all around the house.My only complaint is the battery life. I'm getting about 2.5 hours on it before the warning light starts blinking. That, to me, is pretty disappointing for a speaker that's more than $150 and meant to be portable. I basically have to use it as a wired speaker every other time I use it. Since I mainly use it in-house, that's not a deal breaker, but if you want to actually take it places, that could be a problem.
The media could not be loaded. Super recomendo este produto, fiquei impressionado com a qualidade e potência do som.. Jbl não decepciona, produto de qualidade top!!
Very good sound quality and great bass

reviews.reviewTitle: Great sound. Rugged. Long battery life.
reviews.reviewText: These are excellent. I’m a former high-end audio salesperson. I use my Charge 5 everywhere: in the house, in the garage, by the lake, on the deck. It’s easy to connect to (my wife is a technophobe and she loves this thing). The battery lasts amazingly long, and the sound is remarkable for the size. I just bought one for a friend for his wedding - now he’s loving his! I owned 3 cheaper Bluetooth speakers before this one and was worried I was spending too much on this. It wasn’t cheap, but it’s definitely worth the money.

reviews.reviewTitle: INCREÍBLE, La batería le dura muchísimo
reviews.reviewText: La bocina físicamente es hermosa, y lo es más en este diseño verde camo. Al principio tenía miedo de comprarla pues he tenido malas experiencias comprando bocinas JBL en internet (me han llegado bocinas falsas o copias). Aquí no hay duda de que es una JBL Charge 5 original (Made in Vietnam), todos los acabados y materiales son de la mejor calidad, y obviamente el sonido es increíble.Tiene mucha potencia para el tamaño de la bocina. No esperes dejar sordos a tus amigos en una fiesta de 100 personas, pero sí tiene suficiente potencia para ambientar alguna reunión familiar y un poco más. En mi cuarto (que es como de 5m x 10m) la uso máximo a 50% de volumen y ya es mucho escándalo.Quiero hablar de la batería porque muchos compradores mencionan que les dura 5 o 6 horas, pero imagino que debe ser porque les tocó una batería defectuosa, o la usan siempre a 100 de volumen o de plano les tocó una imitación.Así que quise hacer una prueba bastante precisa sobre la duración de la batería en mi bocina Charge 5.Primero me aseguré de vaciar completamente la batería de la Charge 5, luego la cargué a full durante más de 4 horas. Y entonces usé la bocina durante varios días llevando la cuenta del tiempo exacto que la usé cada día, hice esto hasta que se le acabó la batería y se apagó por sí sola. Estoy consciente que la duración de la batería depende mucho del volumen en el que la uses y el tipo de música que reproduzcas con ella. En mi lugar de trabajo no puedo hacer mucho escándalo, así que usé la bocina a volumen de aproximadamente 30% durante esta prueba (que es un muy buen volumen para que ambiente este negocio sin llegar a ensordecer). La música que reproducí fue mayormente rock y pop.El resultado fue este: Usando volumen de 30% con música rock y pop, la batería me duró unas impresionantes 28 horas!No sé ustedes, pero para mí este resultado por mucho superó mis expectativas.Si, como yo, necesitas una bocina para ambientar un cuarto chico, mediano o grande, con muy buena calidad de audio (sin ser una bocina carísima para audiofilos) esta bocina es perfecta para ti, la recomiendo totalmente.
